name: This Game Suck
description:
Hey there, my name is DePonce and this is a prototype. I just did all this in one day with help of a tutorial. Yes I am new to this and this is my first game and I know it sucks but I'm proud of it so yeah. Also that's a good picture of my face so and gold bananaz so yeah. Cant go wrong there. Thank you and enjoy.

-DP
